channel.description: Recent content in ci-cd on Fluent QA Blog

item.title: Ansible 60分钟入门
item.description: Ansible 介绍 Ansible可以用来帮助IT自动化，关于ansible的一点说明: Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy and maintain.

item.title: Jenkins API的简单介绍
item.description: Jenkins 介绍 Jenkins是一个非常有用的持续集成的工具，可以通过它完成代码的build，测试，发布等一系列的事情. From Jenkins Home Page Jenkins is an automation engine with an unparalleled plugin ecosystem to support all of your favorite tools in your delivery pipelines, whether your goal is continuous integration, automated testing, or continuous delivery.
